eeye (21 da) perawaruwe peradeniya sita kolambaa dakwa yamata sanwidhanaya kara thibunu shishya pagamana polisiya magin athhituwana ladi.mahanuwara athireka mahesthrath rawindra premarathna mahatha wisin nikuth kala thahanam niyogayak anuwa peradeniya polisiya shishya pagamana thahanam kara thibini.peradeniya polisiya magin adhikaranayen karana lada illimak anuwa mahesthrathwaraya ema niyogaya nikuth karana ladi.mahanuwara kolambaa margaya rathawahana dhawanayatath, mahajanathawage edineda katayuthuwalata badha athiwimath, wishwa widyala sisunge udghoshanayen gatumkari thaththwayak athiwimata ida thibena bawin polisiya adhikaranaya niyogaya labagath bawa jyeshta niyojya polispathi ech. en. bi. ambaanwala mahatha pawasiya.eeye (21 da) aluyam wele sitama yuda hamudawa saha polisiya peradeniya para, galaha watarawuma athulu pradeshaye rakawalla thibini.margaye atham sthanawala saha galaha handiya pradeshaya marga badhaka ha kambi aadiya yoda rakawalla thibina.sarasawi sisun thun dahasak pamana udghoshanayata sahabhagi wi siti athara polisiya ha yuda hamudawa pansiyayak pamana aarakshaka katayuthuwala nirathawi sitiyaha.
lankawe wahana wala widuru tintad karana eka thahanam kiyana, nithiyata nam mama eka payinma kamathiyi..!!

aya memangin anekuth chanda apekshakayan atharata janathawa dewarak chandaya di path kala janadhipathiwarayakuta thawa warak illimata awasthawa labena bawa pahadiliwa kiyanawa.ema nisa ema karuna anuwa shreshtadhikaranaya janatha chandayen dewarak pathwu janadhipathiwarun gana katha karana wita ema sudusukam thiyana ekama thanaththa mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumayi.

buddhimaya depala panatha yatathe githa kshethraye gayana, githa rachana saha sangithaya yana ansha sandaha karthru bhaga gewima araliyagaha mandirayedi eeye (08) pawathwina.janadhipathithumage upades paridi me karthru bhaga gewimata sambandha regulasi janamadhya ha thorathuru amathyanshaya pasugiyada gasat karana ladi.ee anuwa pasugiya demasaka kalaye pracharaya kala githa sandaha karthru bhaga pirinamimata piyawara gath athara prawina gayaka gayikawanta, githa rachakayanta saha sangithawedinta sankethathmakawa karthru bhaga pirinamini.parani gayaka gayikawange parani githa sanrakshana kota anagatha parapurata dayada kala yuthu bawa janadhipathithuma mehidi awadharanaya kaleya.parani githa aluth kirima nisa mul githaya pilibanda awadhanaya anagatha parapuren gilihi gos athi bawa da rajapaksha mahatha kiya.mehidi katha kala gayana shilpini indrani senarathna, rata jathiya aagama gana pamanak nowa sama kshethrayakama katayuthu soya bala katayuthu kirima wasanawak bawa kiwaya.

kolambaa - shri lankawa
api karanna oone amma thaththa nathi aya diha balala hitha hada ganan eka nam apita ee de karanna harima lesiyi.
sancharaka shri lankawa saha dakunu aprikanu kandayama athara ada(15) pawathwena palamu test krikat tharagaye kasiye wasiya dinu dakunu aprikawa palamuwa pandu rakimata thiranaya kara thibe.

samaja sanwardhanaya udesa karya bharaye di wiharastha shasanarakshaka mandala sama wiharasthanayakama aarambha kare.dharma winayadhara bhikshu parapurak ha pansil surakina charithawath bauddha jana samajayak bihi kirime aramunin pas awurudu salasmak sampadanaya kara athi bawath ema salasma dipa wyaptha kirime wagakima pawari aththe pradeshiya shasanarakshaka mandala wetha bawath samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaye sabhapathi, kalaniya wishwawidyalaye kulapathi ha paliyagoda widyalankara pariwenadhipathi kolambaa halawatha dedi sawe pradhana sangha nayaka aacharya walamitiyawe kusaladhamma nahimiyo ema samuluwe mulasuna hobawamin pawasuha.apekama ha shraddhawa athi nayakayek apata labi thibena bawin nathi wi giya apekamath, ape sanskruthiyath athulu gunanga apata dan nawatha godanangimata hakiwi thibena bawath ee sandaha mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma dakwana sahaya shakthiya pilibandawa ethumata aashirwada karana bawada unwahanse pawasuha.sambudu sasune chirasthithiya, aarakshawa ha unnathiya udesa samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaya mangin rupiyal koti dekaka pamana mudalak gatha wu wasara kipaya thuladi yodawa athayi samastha lanka shasanaraksha mandalaye pradhana lekhakadhikari gonaduwe gunananda himiyo pawasuha.wathmanehi athi pradhana abhiyogayak wanuye pawidi kirima sandaha daruwan soya ganime apahasuthawayayi.

madhyawedi nimalarajan mayilwaganam ghathanaya kara adata(okthobar 19) ta wasara 15k gathaweyi. 2000 okthobar 19 wanada yapanaye adhiaarakshaka kalapayakadi nimalarajan ghathanaya karana wita bibisi sinhala saha demala sewayata menma wirakesari puwathpathata saha rawaya puwathpathata wisheshayen uthure sidukarana wyasanayan wartha karamin sitiya ha. 2000 warshayedi chandrika bandaranayaka janadhipathiwariya siya palanaya gena giya samaye, anuruddha rathwaththe niyojya aarakshaka amathidhuraya dara kalaye nimalarajan madhyawediya ghathanaya karanu labanne adirinithiya panawa thibu rayaka, adhiaarakshaka kalapayak lesa nam kara thibu pradeshayaka, sannaddhawa pamini kandayamak wisin ohuge niwasa thuladima ya.
